CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ContactableByEmail__c == TRUE,OR(MailingCountry='United Kingdom', MailingCountry='United Kingdom',MailingCountry='United States',MailingCountry='Japan', MailingCountry='Singapore',MailingCountry='Germany', MailingCountry='France',MailingCountry='Italy', MailingCountry='Hong Kong',MailingCountry='Canada', MailingCountry='Macao',MailingCountry='Australia', MailingCountry='Brazil',MailingCountry='Mexico', MailingCountry='Andorra',MailingCountry='Austria', MailingCountry='Belgium',MailingCountry='Croatia', MailingCountry='Cyprus',MailingCountry='Czech Republic', MailingCountry='Denmark',MailingCountry='Estonia', MailingCountry='Finland',MailingCountry='Greece', MailingCountry='Hungary',MailingCountry='Ireland', MailingCountry='Latvia',MailingCountry='Liechtenstein', MailingCountry='Lithuania',MailingCountry='Luxembourg', MailingCountry='Malta',MailingCountry='Monaco', MailingCountry='Netherlands',MailingCountry='Norway', MailingCountry='Poland',MailingCountry='Portugal', MailingCountry='Romania',MailingCountry='Slovenia', MailingCountry='Spain',MailingCountry='Sweden', MailingCountry='Switzerland',MailingCountry='Korea Republic of',MailingCountry='United Arab Emirates')) , true , false)
CustomField.label: Synchronized SFMC
